entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
